Edges-Leadership -- Male Saxa Human Veteran Messenger
Attributes (10 Points):
Agility: d10 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d8 Strength: d8 Vigor: d8
Skills (17 Points):
Fighting: (agi) d10 Notice: (sma) d6 Riding: (agi) d10
Intimidation: (spi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Streetwise: (sma) d8
Languages: Black Tongue; Saxa; Vendahl
Skill Notes: Blood Feud: -2 Charisma (rival family)
Size: 0 Deity: The Norns
Advances: 8 Improvement Points: 22 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 10; Edge: 10; Skill: 2
Description Notes: Diverse: +2 Improvement Points (edge or skills)
Features
Edges (5 points): Command; Drop!; Forced March; Help Me!; Take Aim Hindrances: Blood Feud; Death Wish; Poverty; Vengeful Saxa Human Features: Diverse
Feature Notes:
Command: R5" Commanded +1 to recover from Shaken
Death Wish: Will risk death for valued goal
Poverty: Starts with half funds, loses half funds each wk
Vengeful: Seeks revenge legally
Combat
Parry: 8 (1) Cover: 2 Toughness: 8 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Chain Hauberk Shield: Medium Shield Weapons: Antler Staff (d8+d6); Bow (2d6 R12"); Short Sword (d8+d6); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +5 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Antler Staff Parry Modifier: +1 Parry when wielded
Drop!: May give one commanded medium ranged cover 1/rd
Forced March: Commanded allies may share running die
Help Me!: Commanded ally may step in front of attack on self 1/rd
Take Aim: Commanded gain +1 shooting and throwing damage (1d6+1 with Coordinated Firepower)
